title: Candy corn tops the list of the worst Halloween candy
text:
A candy retailer has compiled a list of the worst Halloween candies — and candy corn has come out on top. Or shall we say, bottom.

Kicking off October, CandyStore.com has ranked the ten worst and ten best Halloween candies based on a dozen media rankings and 30,000 surveys on their own site.

They found that candy corn is most overwhelmingly considered the most hated treat of the holiday, while Reese’s Peanut Butter Cups are the best.

The worst! CandyStore.com has ranked the ten worst and ten best Halloween candies based on a dozen media rankings and 30,000 surveys on their own site

Blech! They found that candy corn is most overwhelmingly considered the most hated treat of the holiday

The website is US-based, and the rankings appear to reflect popular US candies and preferences.

Compiling survey results along with rankings from the likes of BuzzFeed, Huffington Post, Bon Apetit, Business Insider, Thrillist, MentalFloss, and more, and found that candy corn was most frequently rated as the worst candy.

In second place for worst candy is Circus Peanuts, which were bumped from the number one spot from last year.

Those were followed by Peanut Butter Kisses, Wax Coke Bottles, Necco Wafers, Tootsie Rolls Smarties, Licorice, Good & Plenty, and Bit-O-Honey.

Hate it! The candy is certainly divisive and has inspired people to voice some strong opinions on Twitter

Circus peanuts (left) and chalky Necco wafers (right) didn't fare much better

It's not entirely surprising that candy corn is the most reviled, particularly for anyone who has spent any time on social media during the month of October.

'If you eat candy corn you should be thrown under the jail,' wrote one woman this month.

'PUBLIC SERVICE ANNOUNCEMENT: Candy Corn is absolutely disgusting. If you like Candy Corn, then please seek help immediately. That is all,' another hater tweeted.

Others have called it 'trash' and 'gross,' though it certainly has its defenders too.

Love it! Reese's Peanut Butter Cups were named the best candy

People are also quite passionate about the candy they love, and CandyStore.com also shared a ranking of the 'best' Halloween candies.

Reese’s Peanut Butter Cups won the top honor, followed by Snickers, Twix, Kit Kat, M&Ms, Nerds, Butterfinger, Sour Patch Kids, Skittles, and Hershey Bars.

The site also published an interactive map with the most popular Halloween candy by state.

Interestingly enough, candy corn is the top pick in some states including Idaho, North Dakota, New Mexico, and Iowa.

Other surprising favorites include Hot Tamales in New York and Arizona, Lemonheads in Louisiana, Tootsie Pops in New Jersey and Tennessee, and Jolly Ranchers in Georgia.
